mapper.select:
select tl.id,tu.loginname loginName,tg.grade,tb.businessName,tb.tableName,top.operaType,tl.operateCount,tl.doDate from tb_log tl inner join tb_user tu on tl.uid = tu.id inner join tb_grade tg on tl.gid = tg.id inner join tb_bussiness tb on tl.bid = tb.id inner join tb_operate top on tl.oid =top.id
and loginName like CONCAT('%',#{loginName}, '%')
and businessName like CONCAT('%',#{businessName}, '%')

select tll.id, loginCount, loginTime, tb.loginname loginName from tb_loginlog tll inner join tb_user tb on tll.uid = tb.id
DATE_FORMAT(loginTime, "%Y-%m-%d") >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},"%Y-%m-%d")
and DATE_FORMAT(loginTime, "%Y-%m-%d") <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},"%Y-%m-%d")
and loginName like CONCAT('%', #{loginName}, '%')
select tll.*,tu.loginname loginName from tb_loginlog tll inner join tb_user tu on tll.uid = tu.id where uid = #{uid} order by loginTime desc limit 1;
